summary.span: 提供可存取 Managed 程式碼中所支援的所有 CardSpace 公用作業。

span.span: Provides access to all CardSpace public operations that are supported in managed code.

span.span: Generates a security token using the CardSpace system.

summary.span: 使用 CardSpace 系統和指定之端點、原則、權杖簽發者與權杖序列化程式，產生安全性權杖。

span.span: Generates a security token using the CardSpace system and the specified endpoint, policy, token issuer, and token serializer.
A that represents the generated security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性權杖可以由使用者核發，或由原則簽發者指定的第三方核發。A security token can be issued by the user or by a third party that is specified by the policy issuer.

summary.span: 顯示可供使用者用來對卡片進行建立、刪除、重新命名、修改等動作的 [!INCLUDE[infocard](~/includes/infocard-md.md)] 管理使用者介面。

span.span: Displays the [!INCLUDE[infocard](~/includes/infocard-md.md)] management user interface that allows the user to create, delete, rename, and modify the card.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基於隱私權與安全性考量，[!INCLUDE[infocard](~/includes/infocard-md.md)] 不允許以程式設計存取方式對卡片進行生命週期管理。[!INCLUDE[infocard](~/includes/infocard-md.md)] does not provide programmatic access to the cards for life-cycle management for privacy and security reasons. 例如，您無法以程式設計方式建立、刪除或列舉卡片。For example, you cannot programmatically create, delete, or enumerate cards.
